TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSerializerOperationBehavior extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior, class System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension

Docs.summary: Controls run-time behavior of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> associated with an operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The XmlSerializerOperationBehavior enables control of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> options, such as the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute>.
## Examples The following example finds the XmlSerializerOperationBehavior for a specific operation, and sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute> for the serializer.
[!code-cs[XmlSerializerOperationBehavior#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.servicemodel.de_27_1.cs)] [!code-vb[XmlSerializerOperationBehavior#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.servicemodel.de_27_1.vb)]
